values:
Editor’s note: This is a rebroadcast of a series of videos that went up on All Saints’s YouTube feed during the Summer of 2020. Pastor Steve Jeffery walks us through about Mark Horne’s book, Solomon Says. Visit our website: https://www.allsaintskirk.com Worship with us: 11:00 AM Sundays

The post Solomon Says [Rebroadcast] appeared first on .
